text.text: A Chartered Professional Accountant, Chen Tan graduated with honours from the UBC Sauder School of Business. With a background in tax planning, Chen has more than 10 years of full-time experience as a senior tax manager in a tax specialist group. She served as a senior tax auditor in the Canada Revenue Agency and helps high-asset families with tax planning. At Mountwater Capital, Chen is responsible for financial operation and compliance.
